mentions.speaker: contact
mentions.quote: That Discover card has been sent to collections already.
mentions.context: Client mentions collections status during debt review.

mentions.speaker: contact
mentions.quote: Yeah, a debt collector has been calling me about it.

violation_reason: Client mentioned that an account has been sent to collections and a debt collector is involved, but the agent did not communicate that the account cannot be enrolled or needs to be removed from the program.
key_evidence_quote: That Discover card has been sent to collections already.
